summary: This code clones the Darknet repository, changes directory to it, sets GPU and CUDNN variables, then builds the darknet executable using make.

details.comment: This code clones the Darknet repository, changes directory to it, sets GPU and CUDNN variables, then builds the darknet executable using make.
details.content:
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/AlexeyAB/darknet
cd darknet
# GPU=1
# CUDNN=1
# make y
